thai: What did you come to Thailand to study?
english: jeem maa riian à-rai thîi muueang-thai khá.

thai: I came to study Thai at Chiang Mai University.
english: phǒm maa riian phaa-sǎa-thai thîi má-hǎa-wít-thá-yaa-lai chiiang mài khráp.

thai: You don't have to go to the University to study. I can teach you. This is a spoon. This is a fork. This is a glass.
english: phîi jeem mâi dtâwng bpai riian thîi má-hǎa-wít-thá-yaa-lai ràawk khâ. nǔu sǎawn hâi dâai. nîi khuue cháawn. nîi khuue sâawm. nîi khuue gâaeo.

thai: James, tomorrow I'll take you to the university. I want you to meet one professor.
english: jeem phrûng-níi rao jà phaa jeem bpai má-hǎa-wít-thá-yaa-lai ná. yàak hâi jeem phóp gàp aa-jaan thâan nùeng.

thai: Professor Somsi Triphet. She's your Thai language professor.
english: aa-jaan sǒm-sǐi dtrii-phét khâ. thâan bpen aa-jaan phaa-sǎa-thai khǎawng jeem.

thai: Great. What time will we go?
english: dii looei khráp. phûuak-rao jà bpai gan gìi moong khráp.
thâan bpen aa-jaan phaa-sǎa-thai khǎawng jeem
